Name: Industry Code

Name: Reference Identification Qualifier

Name: Reference Identification
Notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Name: Yes/No Condition or Response Code
Notes: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response
Remarks: DD08 transmits the stock level indicator. A "Y" indicates that the material is normally carried in stock; an "N" indicates that the material is not normally stocked.
